format.name: TitleFormatChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain a title wrapped in double angle brackets, such as <<poem of joy>> (everything except for the title is allowed).

fn_schema.name: extract_report_summary
fn_schema.description: Extracts a concise summary from a detailed report, highlighting main points and conclusions.

detailed_report.description: The full text of a report including abstract, body, and conclusions from which a summary is to be extracted. The argument value must contain a title wrapped in double angle brackets, such as <<poem of joy>>; all other content apart from the title is permitted.

items.description: The names of main sections to be included in the summary, such as introduction, methods, results, and discussion.

include_sections.description: Specific sections from the report to include in the summary.

language.description: The language in which the summary should be provided, specified using language code (for example, 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish).

user_queries:
I recently completed a comprehensive research report on renewable energy adoption in urban centers, and I need your help to make a concise summary. Here’s the entire text of my report, which includes the abstract, the full body with all detailed subsections, and the conclusion:

"Abstract: Urban centers are increasingly adopting renewable energy solutions to meet growing energy demands. ... [long detailed report body continues, including sections: Introduction, Literature Review, Methodology, Results, Discussion, Conclusion] ... Conclusion: This study demonstrates significant potential for solar energy in downtown areas."

For the summary, please include the following sections: Introduction, Results, and Conclusion. Provide the summary in English (en).

I wrote a detailed report about the impact of social media on adolescent mental health, and it is around 25 pages long. I would appreciate it if you could generate a precise summary based on the original text. The entire report is as follows:

"Abstract: This report explores how various social media platforms affect mental well-being among teenagers. ... [report contains sections: Background, Methods, Findings, Analysis, Future Research, References, Appendices, Discussion] ... Discussion: Implications for parents, educators, and policy makers are explored."

Can you give me a summary focusing only on the Methods, Findings, and Discussion sections? Please write the summary in Spanish (es).

I have this extensive report titled 'Advancements in Artificial Intelligence for Medical Diagnostics,' and it's quite detailed. Here is the complete text:

"Abstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing medical diagnostics by improving accuracy and efficiency. ... (full report includes sections: Introduction, Methodology, Data Analysis, Results, Conclusion, Recommendations, Limitations) ... Recommendations: AI integration strategies for healthcare systems."

I want a concise summary that includes the Abstract, Data Analysis, and Recommendations sections, and I need it prepared in French (fr).

Below is the full text of a business report analyzing quarterly financial performances for a multinational corporation, including the abstract, all main body sections, and the conclusion:

"Abstract: This quarter’s financial analysis reviews performance across global divisions. ... (Sections: Executive Summary, Financial Overview, Market Trends, SWOT Analysis, Key Findings, Conclusion) ... Conclusion: The corporation has maintained steady growth amid market challenges."

Kindly extract a concise summary highlighting the Financial Overview, Market Trends, and Key Findings sections. Please provide the summary in German (de).

I recently finished compiling a technical report on climate change adaptation strategies for coastal cities. Here is the entire report text, covering the abstract, the body, and the conclusions:

"Abstract: Coastal cities face unique threats from rising sea levels and increased storm intensity. ... (sections include: Introduction, Literature Review, Proposed Strategies, Case Studies, Results, Discussion, Conclusion) ... Conclusion: Proactive adaptation measures reduce long-term risks."

Can you create a summary based on the Proposed Strategies, Case Studies, and Conclusion sections? I’d like the summary in English (en).
